I'm not sure if this is the best place to ask this, but are you ever going to make a new skin for {{champion:40}}?

> [{quoted}](name=antisquidburp,realm=OCE,application-id=pEj6Ee6n,discussion-id=uj85hb6n,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2016-06-18T20:36:31.837+0000)
>
> I'm not sure if this is the best place to ask this, but are you ever going to make a new skin for {{champion:40}}?

That's a great question for **Ask Riot**! There's a place for that over on the **Ask Riot **webpage:

https://ask.leagueoflegends.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

Cheers!

Wow so many things in SO MANY places!

How is a person supposed to accumulate all this bounty with the cost of fuel these days.  Public transport is unreliable and the taxi support doesn't know the directions.

>

>

All of this is regularly posted on the League of Legends frontpage and often in the client.
It was a statement, Wuks, not a request.  But thanks anyway.
Wait you mean to tell me that Riot actually listens to community ideas, but only if they are posted there? Sounds like EA to me...

> [{quoted}](name=EzeBlood,realm=OCE,application-id=pEj6Ee6n,discussion-id=uj85hb6n,comment-id=000700010000,timestamp=2016-06-19T09:11:00.822+0000)
>
> Wait you mean to tell me that Riot actually listens to community ideas, but only if they are posted there? Sounds like EA to me...

Posting to the Ask Riot page is the best place to ensure that the appropriate team receives your question. For instance, the Riot Oceania regional team likely wouldn't have information pertaining to upcoming skins, unless that information is already public facing.

I don't really like the legendary skin or the ice skin, I already have the hextech skin and her only other skins are either legacy or a challenger reward. most of her skins besides her legendary and the ice one don't change anything except her model.
Is any of the ultimate skins ever gonna be on sale? and when would the project yi/zed and other project skins be on sale?

> [{quoted}](name=Goldfoot,realm=OCE,application-id=pEj6Ee6n,discussion-id=uj85hb6n,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2016-06-18T04:35:45.542+0000)
>
> Is any of the ultimate skins ever gonna be on sale? and when would the project yi/zed and other project skins be on sale?

As far as I'm aware, Ultimate Skins aren't discounted during any sales other than the Early Sale. 
> A year or more is a long time to wait for a deal, so we are adding a monthly sale featuring skins of all tiers. All non-Legacy skins will go in the sale 4-6 months after release. This means skins that previously didn’t have early discounts (750s and 975s) will start going on sale sooner.

>We also want players to have a chance to get a deal on skins of any tier, which conflicts with the fact that we previously didn’t discount legendary skins (1820s). So we're making future Legendary skins eligible for the early sale (previously released 1820s won’t be going on sale though). This’ll be the only time Legendary and Ultimate skins will be purchasable at a direct discount.

Here's the updated discount policy: 
http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales/were-changing-discounts

Hope that helps!

Still waiting for a new skin for {{champion:4}} that actually changes how things apart from this closes look!!!

I think they should do Secret Agent TF. Have a black trench coat Neo style, with technological cards (or perhaps actual poker cards as a James Bond reference), and have some spy-esque animations, maybe a holographic interface when he's channeling his ult.
I notice the once 'hard-to-obtain' Chrome Rammus skin is now being gifted randomly.  Really devalues the belief that one can earn one's distinguishing tuxedos.

> [{quoted}](name=mcsmithaus,realm=OCE,application-id=pEj6Ee6n,discussion-id=uj85hb6n,comment-id=000c,timestamp=2016-06-21T18:50:51.928+0000)
>
> I notice the once 'hard-to-obtain' Chrome Rammus skin is now being gifted randomly.  Really devalues the belief that one can earn one's distinguishing tuxedos.

Chrome Rammus is an available skin, and isn't even classified as Legacy or Limited Edition. 750RP in the shop, I believe.

Exactly.  It never used to be.  It is now & I am wondering why!  You are random, aren't you Wuks?

I mean, did u know it was an award, previously.  Or, did you just get out of primary and go straight to Rifting?

> [{quoted}](name=mcsmithaus,realm=OCE,application-id=pEj6Ee6n,discussion-id=uj85hb6n,comment-id=000c00000000,timestamp=2016-07-20T17:37:07.446+0000)
>
> Exactly.  It never used to be.  It is now & I am wondering why!  You are random, aren't you Wuks?
> 
> I mean, did u know it was an award, previously.  Or, did you just get out of primary and go straight to Rifting?

It was distributed at events, similar to how Arcade Miss Fortune and Arcade Hecarim were distributed at events, but none of these skins were at any point Legacy or Limited Edition.

"Distributed"!  Actually means "Earned".  But wots da point in Earning a Skin when it later becomes purchaseable.

Really you Rifters ought to talk to Riot.  I mean Seriously talk to Riot & get some facts b4 you begin to engage with Mature Summoners.
